answers.a: It is typically extracted from fermentation broth by alkaline solubilization (e.g., NaOH) and removal of solids, then precipitated by neutralization or alcohol, washed, and dried.
Curdlan gum (E424) is a microbial beta-1,3-glucan that forms firm heat-set gels and is used as a thickener and stabilizer in foods.
Curdlan gum (E424) is a microbial beta-1,3-glucan that forms firm heat-set gels and is used as a thickener and stabilizer in foods.
In food labeling, E424 is curdlan, a gelling/thickening agent; it is not related to Samsung products.

answers.q: what is samsung e424? for x1
answers.a: E424 is curdlan in the food E-number system; any Samsung "E424" reference would be unrelated to this food additive.
